segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water overflowing and spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn't seem to feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are being so mischievous, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried for her, standing in that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so calm yet chaotic at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware she is of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should tell her about the water.
segments.speaker: PAR
